item.title: BcNAC056
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BcNAC056 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: BcNAC056-GFP was located in the nucleus at the subcellular level, and BcNAC056 was responsive to leaf senescence and different hormones at the transcriptional level.

item.title: BnAAP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnAAP1 Gene Name: amino acid permease 1 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Three amino acid permeases, BnAAP1, BnAAP2, and BnAAP6, were identified and characterized.

item.title: BnAAP6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnAAP6 Gene Name: amino acid permease 6 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Three amino acid permeases, BnAAP1, BnAAP2, and BnAAP6, were identified and characterized.

item.title: BnaNAC60
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC01g23890D Gene Symbol: BnaNAC60 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaNAC60 positively modulates leaf senescence in Arabidopsis.

item.title: BpMADS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BpMADS4 Gene Name: MADS box protein4 Genome: Species: Betula pendula Functional Descriptions: Heterologous overexpression of the birch FRUITFULL-like MADS-box gene BpMADS4 prevents normal senescence and winter dormancy in Populus tremula L.

item.title: FaPE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaPE1 Gene Name: pectinesterase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Concerning hormone regulation, auxin treatment increased FaPE1 mRNA levels in green fruit, whereas exogenous ethylene decreased FaPE1 mRNA levels in ripe and senescing fruits.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G208300 Gene Symbol: GmNAC018 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNAC039 and GmNAC018, as master regulators of nodule senescence.

item.title: GmNAC039
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.06G157400 Gene Symbol: GmNAC039 Gene Name: NAC Transcription Factor 39 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNAC039 and GmNAC018, as master regulators of nodule senescence.

item.title: GmYUC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g038600 Gene Symbol: GmYUC2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYUC2a mediates auxin biosynthesis during root development and nodulation in soybean.

item.title: HvMND1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU7Hr1G113480.3 Gene Symbol: HvMND1 Gene Name: MANY NODED DWARF1 Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our data suggest that HvMND1 plays a significant role in the coordinated regulation of reproductive phase transitions, thereby promoting reproductive growth and whole plant senescence in barley.

item.title: HvNAC005
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvNAC005 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Barley plants over-expressing the NAC transcription factor gene HvNAC005 show stunting and delay in development combined with early senescence.

item.title: HvPAP14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvPAP14 Gene Name: papain-like cysteine proteinase Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvPAP14, which belongs to the C1A family of cysteine proteases, was identified in senescing barley (Hordeum vulgare L.

item.title: LePHGPx
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LePHGPx Gene Name: phospholipid hydroperoxide glutathione peroxidase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We have isolated a tomato (Lycopersicon esculentum) gene encoding a phospholipid hydroperoxide glutathione peroxidase (LePHGPx).

item.title: LfMYB113
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LfMYB113 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 113 Genome: Species: Liquidambar formosana Functional Descriptions: A R2R3-MYB Gene LfMYB113 is Responsible for Autumn Leaf Coloration in Formosan sweet gum.

item.title: LjCCD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LjSGA_131670.1 Gene Symbol: LjCCD7 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 modulates plant growth, reproduction, senescence, and determinate nodulation in the model legume Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjIPT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjIPT3 Gene Name: isopentenyltransferase3 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Knockdown of LjIPT3 influences nodule development in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjNAC094
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj2g3v1058050.1 Gene Symbol: LjNAC094 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Description: Overexpression of NAC094 induces premature nodule senescence Knocking out NAC094 partially relieves nitrate-induced degradation of leghemoglobins and abolishes nodule expression of senescence-associated genes (SAGs) that contain a conserved binding motif for NAC094.

item.title: LMM5.1;SPL33
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g02720 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0116600 Gene Symbol: LMM5.

item.title: LpNOL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LpNOL Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lolium perenne Functional Description: The objectives of this study were to characterize the function of LpNOL in regulating leaf senescence and to determine the molecular factors and associated metabolic pathways underlying NOL regulation of leaf senescence in perennial ryegrass.

item.title: MdIPT5b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000232324 Gene Symbol: MdIPT5b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Group-C/S1 bZIP heterodimers regulate MdIPT5b to negatively modulate drought tolerance in apple species.

item.title: MdZAT10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000198015 Gene Symbol: MdZAT10 Gene Name: C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The apple C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor MdZAT10 positively regulates JA-induced leaf senescence by interacting with MdBT2.

item.title: MtTdp1α
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtTdp1α Gene Name: tyrosyl-DNA phosphodiesterase 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: An intron-spliced hairpin RNA approach was used for the targeted silencing of the MtTdp1α gene encoding the αisoform of tyrosyl-DNA phosphodiesterase 1 in Medicago truncatula Gaertn.

item.title: NbNOG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Niben101Scf02909g02010.1 Gene Symbol: NbNOG1 Gene Name: Nucleolar GTP-binding protein 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: We characterized NbNOG1, a Nicotiana benthamiana NOG1 ortholog sharing more than 45% amino acid identity with Trypanosoma, yeast, and human NOG1.

item.title: NbRabE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbRabE1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: We characterized the gene expression, subcellular localization, and in vivo functions of a Nicotiana benthamiana small GTPase belonging to the RabE family, designated NbRabE1.

item.title: NtCP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCP1 Gene Name: cysteine protease 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtCP1 encoding a C-terminus partial sequence of a putative tobacco cysteine proteinase gene whereas the 1300 bp fragment (NtCP2) is a full-length cysteine proteinase.

item.title: NtCP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCP2 Gene Name: cysteine protease 2 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtCP2 has a high similarity to KDEL-tailed cysteine proteinases and is expressed in mature green leaves.

item.title: NtNAC028
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtNAC028 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors NtNAC028 and NtNAC080 form heterodimers to regulate jasmonic acid biosynthesis during leaf senescence in Nicotiana tabacum.

item.title: NtNAC080
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtNAC080 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors NtNAC028 and NtNAC080 form heterodimers to regulate jasmonic acid biosynthesis during leaf senescence in Nicotiana tabacum.
